structure.unit: NOTARIES PUBLIC AND COMMISSIONERS OF FOREIGN DEEDS

law.text: For each failure to record his protest as required by KRS 423.030, a notary public shall forfeit all his fees and shall be fined five dollars ($5).
law.history: Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 427, effective January 2, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3727.
